title: ZOO
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Organic, Western, Take-out, Bakery, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. A pasticcheria and bookstore in the heart of the city. Food is vegetarian except bagel with salmon. Vegan choices include cakes, bagels with cauliflower, tofu burgers, soyannaise, and a daily changing menu with soup and salad. Locally sourced. Coffee, black or green teas are refillable; rice or soy milk available.
